data.name: Cell Scientist: Beyond
data.detailed_description:
Cell Scientists is an interactive experience deeply rooted in science, yet exciting and addictive in a positive way.

At its core it is a puzzle game with 100 levels with an easy to pick gameplay mechanics. Your objective is destroy the disease caused by Chagas virus, you must perform this mission in the shortest time possible before the symptoms of the disease kill the patient, because there are no vaccines that can destroy it, so it is necessary to embark on an adventure to destroy it within the body of each patient.
data.about_the_game:
Cell Scientists is an interactive experience deeply rooted in science, yet exciting and addictive in a positive way.

At its core it is a puzzle game with 100 levels with an easy to pick gameplay mechanics. Your objective is destroy the disease caused by Chagas virus, you must perform this mission in the shortest time possible before the symptoms of the disease kill the patient, because there are no vaccines that can destroy it, so it is necessary to embark on an adventure to destroy it within the body of each patient.
data.short_description: A cool puzzle game in which you play though a 100 levels story mode (but with a more serious tone than your traditional Puzzle Game)
data.supported_languages: English, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7100 @ 2.40GHZ
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700HQ @ 2.80GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
